author: faridz
msg: * exec.cpp [WIN32]: Added map between NT_STATUS values and UNIX signals.
(exec_file) [WIN32]: Translate exit code to signal value using map.
* runall.cpp [WIN32]: Removed #include'ing of signal.h and windows.h.
